description: Test suite for the RoomsService in a Flutter application, utilizing mock Dio HTTP client to verify network responses, error handling, and interceptor behavior.

classes.name: MockDio
classes.description: Mock implementation of the Dio HTTP client used for testing network interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point for the test suite that initializes environment, sets up mock client, and groups related tests for RoomsService.
